name: Spirit Gorgons. Silent Watcher
description: A dark female silhouette in a black mantle stands on the quiet riverbank, embodying rebirth and inner strength. The stillness and grace of her figure evoke an ancient statue, while a gentle breeze stirs the fabric, adding a subtle rhythm of motion. The water reflects her form, creating an atmosphere of mystical transformation between the material and mythical worlds. This NFT is part of the “Rebirth of the Gorgon” series, dedicated to the archetype of power, mystery, and renewal.
